role.argrole: thing arg0 can do nothing about

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 但是)) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 面对) (NP-OBJ (DNP (ADJP (JJ 那样)) (DEG 的)) (ADJP (JJ 大)) (NP (NN 环境))))) (PU ，) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 即使)) (VP (VV 亲如) (NP-OBJ (NN 父女))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VV 无能为力))))
example.arg: *pro* 即使 亲如 父女
*PRO* 面对 那样 的 大 环境
